title: Group portrait of two men, including groom in center wearing moustache, dark bow tie, and light colored carnation, and two women standing, including bride wearing headpiece with mid length veil, earrings, three strand necklace, light colored wedding dress with sweetheart neckline under sheer yoke, floral lace over shoulders, long skirt, and light colored short gloves, holding small bible with ribbons and flowers, gathered in interior with plants on right, light colored lace curtains, and television set on the left
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
